q: What documents are required for a personal loan?
a: Typically a government ID and last 2 payslips. This can be configured per-tenant in Documents config.
Toggle the 'portal.esign' feature flag in Tenant Admin > Feature Flags.
In S3-compatible storage (MinIO locally). Use /api/files/presign to upload via presigned URL.
Rate cards define base APR plus deltas by score tiers; configured per tenant in Pricing.
Yes. Start with mock KYC; swap provider via Tenant Admin > Providers in production.
